CUT PIECE, 1964
When I do Cut Piece, I get into a trance, and so I don't feel too frightened. There's several layers of meanings. I was saying, 'hey, you're doing this to women'. By not fighting, we show them that there's a whole world which could exist by being peaceful. https://t.co/8atcKXc0Qi

content:
Towards the end of the Second World War, I looked like a little ghost because of the food shortage. I was hungry. It was getting easier to just lie down and watch the sky. That’s when I fell in love with the sky, I think.
Since then, all my life, I have been in love with the sky. https://t.co/1pUaMGbrrw
